Jan. 22, 1949 D Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest (Section A)
Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest (Section A) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest huddersfield-district-bba-december-conte-4825
None
Test Piece Contest
Four Preludes
Huddersfield Town Hall, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England, UK March contest - 1st Lockwood, 2nd Hepworth, 3rd Sklelmanthorpe. Hymn tune contest - 1st Skelmanthorpe, 2nd Lockwood, 3rd Hepworth. Believed to be the first of these winter contests - British Bandsman Feb 5 1949 states - contest was a great success and it was hoped it would be an annual affair.
Feb. 10, 2014, 5:01 p.m. Feb. 15, 2020, 8:29 p.m.
1 Hepworth (Cookson Homes) Unknown
2 Lockwood Band (Huddersfield) Unknown
3 Skelmanthorpe Band Unknown
